survey_response.review_text: I had frequent knee dislocation problems before and I also experienced doctors wrongly diagnosing my case. But the moment I consulted Dr. Raghu, I knew I was in right hands. He was extremely calm, professional and made the right judgement for my case. I underwent MPFL surgery- ligament reconstruction surgery and the doctor did the surgery perfectly and also the rehabilitation plan which included his team of physiotherapists went perfectly well and I recovered very quickly. His entire team - Meenu, Nithya etc were very professional and helpful. I am very grateful towards Dr. Raghu. I would definitely recommend him to other patients.

review_reply.reply_text: Thanks for the feedback and the trust You had put in to  make your mother undergo treatment from me

survey_response.review_text:
My mother was suffering from knee joint pains from last 20 years, and recently we consulted Dr. Raghu Nagaraj Sr. Orthopedics consultant and went for the Bilateral TKR surgery as my mother was in the rite stage to under go for the surgery,
Surgery was successful..!! , she just walked a day after the surgery with walker support and discharged from the hospital in just 3 days after the surgery. Now my mother is under Physio therapy treatment and she is walking without any walker support.
I really thank you Dr. Raghu Nagaraj sir..
I recommend Dr. Raghu Nagaraj for all Orthopedic Care and Especially for Knee Replacement Surgery, ** ** *** ** *** **** ******* ** **********
And also I need say about the Meenu Manager. Orthopedics, She is really helped us about all the treatment process and before surgery We called her even in the night time as well to know some information, she is very cool & humble person. Thanks Meenu madam for all your support..

review_reply.reply_text: Thank you Anshul for the feedback

survey_response.review_text:
I had a massive Ankle (Talus) burst and was treated by other doctors ** ******** They had given up on my ankle and suggested to move with a limp lifelong and suggested to wear an insole in my shoes as my foot was not flat anymore .
I got a chance to visit Dr. Raghu and in the first visit he was able to figure out the cause of the limp and limited Dorsiflexion movement in the Ankle.
He then suggested an Ankle Key hole surgery which was conducted by him and eventually I was able to walk without a limp and I was keep my foot flat on the ground.
Thanks to his visionary analysis that today I can wear slippers and flat foot shoes.

Doctor is in extreme hurry and will be done with your case without even hearing the complete problem.

Did not suggest any useful exercises/precautions for the ailment. Had to visit another doctor for detailed consultation.

Non productive use of time and money.

Dr.Raghu Nagraj is professional sound. ******* ******** ********* ** **** ** **** ***** ** *** ********* ************* Has immense experience in arthroscopic surgery. I underwent ACL reconstruction surgery using BPTB graft. He explained everything very well before the surgery. I was inquisitive, so he explained things to me even during the surgery by pointing out various things in the TV(actual scope display). The surgery was a success. I've joined the army now.  Can run 40km with 20kg load effortlessly. ******** ****** ** *** *****

review_reply.reply_text: Thank you Anubhav for the Kind feedback

survey_response.review_text:
I have had consulted Dr. Raghu Nagraj 4 years back for ACL dislocation and he was so friendly and explains all information regarding injury, what would be the probable reason, how may it happen and how fastly we can make ourselves recoverd from the injury. It took 4.5 months for me to get back after healing and to normal activities. Meanwhile, I have referred my friends and took my parents, father-in-law and the outcome was so good.

Eventually, 2 months back I had sports injury again, and had ACL reconstruction and Meniscus Bucket Tear Repair surgery. I went back again to Dr. Raghu and outcome was as expected. With his expertise in counselling, consultation and keep patient motivated, helped me to recover with fast pace. Even I have watched my knee surgery live and saw the nature of surgery and efficacy involved. I would like to highly recommend Dr. Raghu Nagraj. Thanks !

My Wife was suffering from knee joint pains from last 2 years, and finding difficult to manage the pain, recently I met one of my family friend,
he has referred Dr.Raghu Nagaraj, then we consulted Dr. Raghu Nagaraj Sr. Orthopedics consultant and went for the Bilateral TKR surgery ,as my wife was in the right time and right stage to under go for the surgery,since she being Teacher, she had one month leave as Summer vacation, we planned accordinlgy and both knees got operated on 18th April 22.Surgery was successful..!!, next day after surgery she just walked with walker support and support of hospital physio and got discharged from the hospital in just 3 days after the surgery. Doctor has suggested for physio therapy at home, he referred Aiswarya - Physio therapist, daily she use to visit the home for therapy treatment ,Now my wife is under Physio therapy treatment and she is walking without any walker support and climbing stairs without any support.

I really thank you Dr. Raghu Nagaraj sir and support nursing staff espcially Ms.Joyce at fortis hospital,
And also I need to say about Mrs.Meenu Manager. Orthopedics, She is really helped us for all the treatment process-before/after surgery, Despite of given disturbances,the information that was provided by her at the needed time, she is very cool & humble person. Thanks Meenu madam for all your support..

I recommend Dr. Raghu Nagaraj for all Orthopedic Care and Especially for Knee Replacement Surgery

My 7 yrs. old kid had a displaced humerus fracture in her left hand in June 2021 and we were advised to meet Dr Raghu Nagaraj ** ********* ********** ******* *** ************ by our family member. He treated my child and gave us a confidence that my daughter will be all good in few weeks. As parents of a 7yr old kid, we were very much concerned and worried about this situation but his clear explanations and approach made us feel comfortable throughout this process. My kid is all fine and happy now, back to her normal playful life.

Dr Sreejith(Physiotherapist), a cheerful and helpful person who made my kid feel very comfortable with every session. He used to check with us on her progress and ask her if she is doing her exercises every day. He was also concerned about the pain after the sessions but luckily, she didn’t face any pain. She was very happy and was eagerly waiting to meet him for her sessions.

We also met doctor’s manager Meenu mam, who is very approachable, supportive and helped us in all our queries and communications with the doctors.
We are very happy with my kid’s speedy recovery by the efforts of this wonderful team and heartfelt thanks to Dr. Raghu Nagaraj, Dr Sreejith (Physiotherapist) and Meenu mam, for being helpful and guiding us through this journey of recovery.

He is a fantastic doctor with a smiling face. He explained everything so clearly to clarify doubts. His team members Meena, Joy, and Sreejith were very helpful in the entire process. I am already walking happily :) I totally recommend Dr. Raghu Nagarj.

I visited him for my elder sister's ACL reconstruction.....the doctor's behaviour, way of treating the patient, explaining the issue from the test reports, undergoing the surgery and the post surgery follow ups and visits....everything was upto the mark. He could be the best doctor for patients of every age and gender. My sister is doing well now and we are too much satisfied with his treatment.

I had frequent knee dislocation problems before and I also experienced doctors wrongly diagnosing my case. But the moment I consulted Dr. Raghu, I knew I was in right hands. He was extremely calm, professional and made the right judgement for my case. I underwent MPFL surgery- ligament reconstruction surgery and the doctor did the surgery perfectly and also the rehabilitation plan which included his team of physiotherapists went perfectly well and I recovered very quickly. His entire team - Meenu, Nithya etc were very professional and helpful. I am very grateful towards Dr. Raghu. I would definitely recommend him to other patients.

review_reply.reply_text: Thanks for the feedback and the trust You had put in to  make your mother undergo treatment from me

review_reply.reply_text: Thank you Shruthi for the trust you and your family had in me for all the treatment

survey_response.review_text: Very professional and a really good Doctor. My father had 2 successful surgeries - Hip replacement and knee ACL MCL reconstruction surgery. He has done it extremely well and helped my father recover. He is very kind and explains each and everything clearly and patiently. We are all very grateful and happy to have met him.

this review has two sections1. the queue management is absolutely pathetic in Arthomed. I booked through practo and my reservation was at 7 pm. I could meet the doctor at 8:20pm. they do not honour practo timings, the manage their own roaster the moment you will reach there.2. I really liked the doctor friendliness. He gave me ample amount of time to understand my problem and explained everything in detail.I will really recommend the doctor but you have to go there with at least 1:30-2:30 hrs in hand and there is no real benefit by booking through practo.

Initially i had conversion with Dr.Raghu Nagaraj to know about TKR operation in detail and also about the cost for doing that .Raghu sir is down to earth, even though in his busy schedule he explained about TKR n gave his secretary number for more details.Later we met directly to meenu mam(secretary). She is very calm n cool person.The way of response from her was very satisfactory. That mainly made us to go under TKR operation at fortis cunningham road hospital.Even had a convertion with a different manager or secretary (Ramya manager, orthopedic)From the same hospital but different location(bannerugatta) was totally unsatisfactory.So we come to the conclusion n did a TKR operation for my mom at fortis, cunningham road.Now my mom is walking indepedentally without any support. Thanks to doctor Raghu Nagaraj.Special thanks to meenu madam because she guided properly about insurance claim, hospital procedures that really helped us a lot.

review_reply.reply_text:
I request you not to give wrong narration of the story ..  I listened to all your fathers problem with patience , examined your father in detail and sent him for xray. Through out the process I involved you and father together to make you understand the problem what your father has . When I started explaining the treatment , your father cut me in the middle of explanation and started asking doubt  which was unrelated to the treatment part I was explaining at the moment . So I  requested him to listen to my treatment explanation first so that he or you shouldn’t get confused in the treatment and take it in a wrong way leading to incomplete treatment . I asked himTo ask his doubts later again though I had listened to him for a long time
Earlier . My only intention was that treatment explanation to go uninterrupted so that patient understand it Ina. Clear mind and avoid taking  it in a wrong way leading to complications and incomplete recovery..

survey_response.review_text: Consulted him for my 74 yr old father’s hip ailment. ** **** ** ** ******* *** ******* ******* *** ********* ** ******* **** ** *** ****** *** ** *** ******* ********** ** ** ***** ***** *** ** ***** ** *** ***** **** ******** **** *** *** ******** ** **** ** *** ****** ** ******. But what took me by surprise was the way doctor expressed his annoyance and cut the conversation. ***** ** ***** **** it is not only important that he says, but that what he says should be understood by the patient. A doctor must watch out for cues in conversing with his patients. Hope he’ll understand that patients ** ** ********* **** *** ***** ******** ******* ****** ** *** *** ***** ** ***** ***** **** ** **** *** ** *** *** ******** Above all a genuine concern for the parient would help. *** *** ******** **** **** ******* **** **** *** * *** ***** ** **** *** ** ******* **** **** ** ****
The environment is so depressing. Receptionist was complaining about doctor. Doctor seems frustrated to give time to his patients. *** ** ** ***** ** ******* * ********* ******

Doctor was attentive and took the time to understand and diagnose the issue.

He also ensured to explain the prognosis and the treatment required in depth.
I've consulted the doctor before and he explains the problem well and helps cure it. The physiotherapy suggested by him is very helpful

review_reply.reply_text:
Your issues are related to rheumatology problem. You need a rheumatologist consultation. That’s what I referred you to him. I have given initial treatment to control the problem. 
Referring the patient to a specific specialist is not wrong. 
Each Doctor has particular specialisation.

survey_response.review_text: ** ** ****** ** ******* *** ***** * He is suggesting to visit other doctor. what is the point  visiting this doctor when he referred some other doctor
The doctor was open and forthcoming in explaining the problem and the way to solving it. Friendly and patient staff

Doctor Nagaraj gave a patient hearing to my shoulder problem and explained the issue and treatment clearly. I have consulted Dr Nagaraj several times in the past for different orthopaedic issues and have always received satisfaction.
Doctor is friendly and help us to understand the problem clearly. He also give attention to our queries and clarify it well. I strongly recommend him
He explained very well with model so that we can understand , also in the MRI plate as well. We entered the consultation room exactly on appointment time. Overall experience is super.
Even though I had hassles to find the location of the clinic, the doctor was friendly and professional. Walked me through the treatment in detail.

Superb experience. Didn’t scare us. Explained everything and has suggested very easy medication. Did not make us do any unnecessary tests or anything. 

Clinic is also super clean and comfortable.

It's nice to discuss with him the problem and getting full information about the issue and solution.

Feeling comfortable and satisfied 😊

Very genuine doctor *** *** **** ********* *** does not make you go through tests until really necessary.  He also treated my ACL condition in 2016 and I am now back to sports at the same level as before the surgery at the age of 46.

Hello sir my name is Sampad basak , age 25 west bengal present.
I saw you 3 months ago, I had lower back pain. you were giving me medicine Asked to talk to you after 2 months. But I am commenting because I don't have your phone number. Pain increased for 2 days. It hurts so much.

** ** *** **** ** *** **** The way surgery is performed doesn't look its a hard one , I can hardly see a scar. The recovery is very quick with no side effects after surgery. He is vastly and experienced, confident of what he is doing and passes the same confidence to patience who is scared of surgery (like me).. highly recommend him..

Contacted Dr.raghu for acl damage and medial meniscus bucket handle tear. Very professional and proactive in providing solutions..
I was skeptical for surgery but he explained that it's the only way to get back normal..
He even suggeated for physiotherapy clinic which was really good and I am recovering quite well under his guidance..

I highly recommend Dr.raghu for any knee injury.
Thanks.
Good experience  with the staff members. Doctor explained the issue in detail. And told the precautionary measures.
